A genetic experiment gone wrong, where a horse's DNA was somehow altered to give it the appearance of a zebra.
A zebra was captured in the wild and brought to a farm, where it was trained to ride like a horse.
A zebra and a horse were bred together to create a hybrid animal with the appearance of both.
A person was given the ability to transform into a horse or a zebra at will, and chose to take on the appearance of a zebra.
A horse was given a special coat of paint to mimic the appearance of a zebra.
